import numpy as np
import mne
from mne.preprocessing import ICA
from mne import create_info
from mne.channels import read_montage

# Data creation
sfreq = 1000  # Sampling rate
ch_names = ['Fz', 'Cz', 'Pz', 'Oz', 'Fp1']  # EEG channel names
ch_types = ['eeg'] * 5  # EEG channel types
info = create_info(ch_names=ch_names, ch_types=ch_types, sfreq=sfreq)
data = np.random.randn(5, 10000)  # 5 EEG channels, 1000 Hz sampling rate, 10 seconds of random noise
raw = mne.io.RawArray(data, info)

# Preprocessing
raw.filter(l_freq=1, h_freq=40)  # Band-pass filter (1–40 Hz)
raw.set_eeg_reference(ref_channels='average')  # Set EEG average reference
ica = ICA(n_components=3, random_state=97)  # Initialize ICA with 3 components
ica.fit(raw)  # Fit ICA to the raw data
raw = ica.apply(raw)  # Remove at least 2 components

print("Data creation and preprocessing completed successfully.")
